reviews.review:
I have honestly gotten so sick of people using scripts in competitive, that I see no real reason to play this game any more. If you, for some asanine reason, enjoy this kind of shit, then please buy it. If you're a sensible person, just don't. This game has both no merit, and no positive points. Headshots don't register, so don't try and learn how to aim. 

I've hated this fucking game since I bought it, and I regret it completely.
muito divertido muito legal muito loco muito irrado muito PICA
have fun with friends or make friends and have fun
沒玩過CS:GO，還能說你是射擊遊戲玩家嗎？
Bileği olmayan hile kullanıyor olsa da arkadaşlar ile girmesi eğlenceli bir oyun.
Игра реально крутая,можно в ней провести свободное время тем,кто любит побеждать.
not a fun game. you have cheat engine installed on your pc and it vac bans you
Gostei demais, jogabilidade muito boa, cs é o melhor jogo de tiro e não tem outro
this game changed my life and view of Esports
Eu recomendo o jogo, mas a valve desde que pos o jogo gratis para quem não tem prime é uma chatice cheio de cheaters, com prime ja é mais controlado, mas fora isso grande jogo.
zinDAGI BARBAD KARTA HAI YE GAME
I have a $2000 sticker stuck on my default M4. This game has affected my mental health deeply.
game is super fun but takes some time to learn the mechanics and cheaters are there but not it prime matches, prime is earned by reaching level 25

shit just dont even look at this ruined community
"vac works", send bans out in waves months apart

CSGO is a simple and straight forward realistic game. I love it for that reason, everybody plays on the same level with no super powers giving them an advantage over other players. This only means that you are as good as you can aim and brings out your true abilities and character as a gamer.
This game has brought me a lot of happiness and it never dies. Takes a lot of commitment to be good, and I really appreciate that!
jogo bom para passar o tempo

Игра достойная! Даже на нон прайме читеров практически не осталось. Игра будет не надоедать до тех пор, пока у вас есть в ней цель!
И, конечно, помните, что приятная игра (без читаков и токсиков) зависит в большей части от нас.
По сути игра не плохая. камьюнити либо шкила либо быдло либо тупые дауны. софт . игра не продвигается . ужасная стрельба и тикрейт . ужасная система рангов .удачи в игре парни
IM SILVER SO EVERYONE IS A HACKER
